description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Indian Roti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Indian Roti Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 tbs butter, melted (save 2 tbs for brushing)

recipeInstructions.text: Sift the flours into a large mixing bowl and add the remaining ingredients except the water. Mix together and gradually add the measured water to form a soft, pliable dough.
Divide the mixture into 8 balls and roll each one out into a 5-6 inch disk. Brush the top of each one with a little melted butter or ghee.

Pat the squid dry with paper towels and cut the bodies into rings about 3/4 inch thick, reserving the tentacles. Mix together the flour, paprika, and cayenne and season well. Put the flour in a plastic bag, add the squid rings and tentacles, and shake until coated.
Remove each roti from the heat and keep warm, wrapped in foil, while cooking the remaining breads. Serve warm with any curry of your choice.
